   21: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %% Purpose:
   23: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: -module(snmp_note_store_SUITE).
   25: 
   26: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Include files
   28: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include("snmp_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: 
   33: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% External exports
   35: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: -export([
   37:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   38:          init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
   39:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2, 
   40:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   41: 
   42: 	 start_and_stop/1,
   43: 	 notes/1,
   44: 	 info/1,
   45: 	 garbage_in/1
   46: 	]).
   47: 
   48: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: %% Internal exports
   50: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: -export([
   52: 	 system_start_time/0
   53:         ]).
   54: 
   55: 
   56: %%======================================================================
   57: %% External functions
   58: %%======================================================================
   59: 
   60: %%======================================================================
   61: %% Test case definitions
   62: %%======================================================================
   63: 
   64: suite() -> 
   65:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   66: 
   67: all() -> 
   68:     [
   69:      start_and_stop,
   70:      notes,
   71:      info,
   72:      garbage_in
   73:     ].
   74: 
   75: groups() -> 
   76:     [].
   77: 
   78: 
   79: 
   80: %%
   81: %% -----
   82: %%
   83: 
   84: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
   85:     ?IPRINT("init_per_suite -> entry with"
   86:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config0]),
   87: 
   88:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
   89:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
   90:             SKIP;
   91: 
   92:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
   93:             %% We need a monitor on this node also
   94:             snmp_test_sys_monitor:start(),
   95: 
   96:             ?IPRINT("init_per_suite -> end when"
   97:                     "~n      Config1: ~p", [Config1]),
   98:             
   99:             Config1
  100:     end.
  101: 
  102: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  103:     ?IPRINT("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  104:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config0]),
  105: 
  106:     snmp_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  107:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  108: 
  109:     ?IPRINT("end_per_suite -> end"),
  110: 
  111:     Config1.
  112: 
  113: 
  114: 
  115: %%
  116: %% -----
  117: %%
  118: 
  119: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  120: 	Config.
  121: 
  122: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  123: 	Config.
  124: 
  125: 
  126: 
  127: %%
  128: %% -----
  129: %%
  130: 
  131: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     ?IPRINT("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  133:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  134: 
  135:     snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  136: 
  137:     ?IPRINT("init_per_testcase -> end"),
  138: 
  139:     Config.
  140: 
  141: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  142: 
  143:     ?IPRINT("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  144:             "~n   Config: ~p",
  145:             [Config]),
  146: 
  147:     ?IPRINT("system events during test: ~p",
  148:             [snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  149: 
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: 
  153: 
  154: %%======================================================================
  155: %% Test functions
  156: %%======================================================================
  157: 
  158: 
  159: %%======================================================================
  160: 
  161: start_and_stop(suite) ->
  162:     [];
  163: start_and_stop(doc) ->
  164:     ["Simple start and stop."];
  165: start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166: 
  167:     Prio = normal,
  168:     Mod  = ?MODULE, 
  169:     Opts = [{verbosity, trace}], 
  170:     {ok, Pid} = snmp_note_store:start_link(Prio, Mod, Opts),
  171:     snmp_note_store:stop(Pid),
  172: 
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: 
  176: %%======================================================================
  177: 
  178: notes(suite) ->
  179:     [];
  180: notes(doc) ->
  181:     ["Testing that it does what it is actually supposed to do, "
  182:      "namilly to handle notes. "];
  183: notes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     Pre = fun() ->
  185:                   ?IPRINT("try start note-store"),
  186:                   case note_store_handler_start() of
  187:                       {ok, Handler, Pid} ->
  188:                           ?IPRINT("started - sleep some before we begin the tests"),
  189:                           ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)), 
  190:                           {Handler, Pid};
  191:                       {error, Reason} ->
  192:                           {skip, ?F("Failed starting note-store: ~p", [Reason])}
  193:                   end
  194:           end,
  195:     Case = fun(State) -> do_notes(State, Config) end,
  196:     Post = fun({Handler, _Pid}) ->
  197:                    note_store_handler_stop(Handler)
  198:            end,
  199:     ?TC_TRY(notes, Pre, Case, Post).
  200: 
  201: do_notes({_, Pid}, _Config) ->
  202: 
  203:     %% Default lifetime is infinity. A note with lifetime
  204:     %% infinity is permanent
  205:     ?IPRINT("create permanent note: sune"),
  206:     true = snmp_note_store:set_note(Pid, sune, 10), 
  207:     10 = snmp_note_store:get_note(Pid, sune),
  208:     10 = snmp_note_store:get_note(Pid, sune),
  209:     
  210:     %% Lifetime is in 1/100 sec ticks, so 500 equals 5 seconds
  211:     ?IPRINT("create 5 sec note kalle"),
  212:     true = snmp_note_store:set_note(Pid, 500, kalle, hobbe), 
  213:     ?IPRINT("wait 1 sec"),
  214:     ?SLEEP(timer:seconds(1)),
  215:     ?IPRINT("get note kalle"),
  216:     hobbe = snmp_note_store:get_note(Pid, kalle),
  217:     ?IPRINT("wait 5 sec"),
  218:     ?SLEEP(timer:seconds(5)),
  219:     ?IPRINT("get note kalle again (now it should not exist)"),
  220:     undefined = snmp_note_store:get_note(Pid, kalle),
  221: 
  222:     ?IPRINT("create 5 sec note kalle"),
  223:     true = snmp_note_store:set_note(Pid, 500, kalle, hobbe), 
  224:     ?IPRINT("wait 6 sec (to allow timer to clean up note)"),
  225:     ?SLEEP(timer:seconds(6)),
  226:     ?IPRINT("get note kalle - should not exist"),
  227:     undefined = snmp_note_store:get_note(Pid, kalle),
  228: 
  229:     ?IPRINT("read the permanent note sune again"),
  230:     10 = snmp_note_store:get_note(Pid, sune),
  231: 
  232:     ?IPRINT("done"),
  233: 
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: 
  237: %%======================================================================
  238: 
  239: info(suite) ->
  240:     [];
  241: info(doc) ->
  242:     ["Testing that we can retrieve process info."];
  243: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  244:     Pre = fun() ->
  245:                   ?IPRINT("try start note-store"),
  246:                   Prio = normal,
  247:                   Mod  = ?MODULE, 
  248:                   Opts = [{verbosity, trace}], 
  249:                   case snmp_note_store:start_link(Prio, Mod, Opts) of
  250:                       {ok, Pid} ->
  251:                           ?IPRINT("note-store started: ~p", [Pid]),
  252:                           Pid;
  253:                       {error, Reason} ->
  254:                           {skip, ?F("Failed starting note-store: ~p", [Reason])}
  255:                   end
  256:           end,
  257:     Case = fun(State) -> do_info(State, Config) end,
  258:     Post = fun(Pid) ->
  259:                    ?IPRINT("attempt stop note-store"),
  260:                    snmp_note_store:stop(Pid)
  261:            end,
  262:     ?TC_TRY(info, Pre, Case, Post).
  263: 
  264: do_info(Pid, _Config) ->
  265: 
  266:     %% Get the info:
  267:     ?IPRINT("get initial info"),
  268:     Info = snmp_note_store:info(Pid),
  269:     ?IPRINT("Info: "
  270:             "~n   ~p", [Info]),
  271: 
  272:     %% Verify content
  273:     ?IPRINT("verify content: get notes process memory"),
  274:     {value, {process_memory, ProcMem}} = 
  275: 	lists:keysearch(process_memory, 1, Info),
  276:     ?IPRINT("get notes process memory"),
  277:     {value, {notes, NotesProcMem}} = 
  278: 	lists:keysearch(notes, 1, ProcMem),
  279:     ?IPRINT("verify notes process memory"),
  280:     if
  281: 	is_integer(NotesProcMem) andalso (NotesProcMem > 0) ->
  282: 	    ok;
  283: 	true ->
  284: 	    throw({error, {bad_notes_proc_memery, NotesProcMem}})
  285:     end,
  286:     ?IPRINT("verify content: get timer process memory"),
  287:     {value, {timer, TmrProcMem}} = 
  288: 	lists:keysearch(timer, 1, ProcMem),
  289:     ?IPRINT("verify content: timer process memory"),
  290:     if
  291: 	is_integer(TmrProcMem) andalso (TmrProcMem > 0) ->
  292: 	    ok;
  293: 	true ->
  294: 	    throw({error, {bad_timer_proc_memery, TmrProcMem}})
  295:     end,    
  296:     ?IPRINT("verify content: get db memory"),
  297:     {value, {db_memory, DbMem}} = 
  298: 	lists:keysearch(db_memory, 1, Info),
  299:     ?IPRINT("verify content: get notes db memory"),
  300:     {value, {notes, NotesDbMem}} = 
  301: 	lists:keysearch(notes, 1, DbMem),
  302:     ?IPRINT("verify content: notes db memory"),
  303:     if
  304: 	is_integer(NotesDbMem) andalso (NotesDbMem > 0) ->
  305: 	    ok;
  306: 	true ->
  307: 	    throw({error, {bad_notes_db_memery, NotesDbMem}})
  308:     end,
  309: 
  310:     ?IPRINT("done"),
  311:     ok.
  312: 
  313: 
  314: %%======================================================================
  315: 
  316: garbage_in(suite) ->
  317:     [];
  318: garbage_in(doc) ->
  319:     ["Test that the process handles garbage sent to it."];
  320: garbage_in(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  321:     Pre = fun() ->
  322:                   ?IPRINT("try start note-store"),
  323:                   Prio = normal,
  324:                   Mod  = ?MODULE, 
  325:                   Opts = [{verbosity, trace}], 
  326:                   case snmp_note_store:start_link(Prio, Mod, Opts) of
  327:                       {ok, Pid} ->
  328:                           ?IPRINT("note-store started: ~p", [Pid]),
  329:                           Pid;
  330:                       {error, Reason} ->
  331:                           {skip, ?F("Failed starting note-store: ~p", [Reason])}
  332:                   end
  333:           end,
  334:     Case = fun(State) -> do_garbage_in(State, Config) end,
  335:     Post = fun(Pid) ->
  336:                    ?IPRINT("attempt stop note-store"),
  337:                    snmp_note_store:stop(Pid)
  338:            end,
  339:     ?TC_TRY(garbage_in, Pre, Case, Post).
  340: 
  341: do_garbage_in(Pid, _Config) ->
  342: 
  343:     ?IPRINT("issue bad request"),
  344:     {error, _} = gen_server:call(Pid, bad_request),
  345: 
  346:     ?IPRINT("cast bad message"),
  347:     gen_server:cast(Pid, bad_message),
  348:     
  349:     ?IPRINT("bang bad info"),
  350:     Pid ! bad_info,
  351: 
  352:     ?IPRINT("verify note-store server still alive and kicking"),
  353:     Info = snmp_note_store:info(Pid),
  354:     if
  355: 	is_list(Info) andalso (length(Info) > 0) ->
  356: 	    ok;
  357: 	true ->
  358: 	    throw({error, {bad_info, Info}})
  359:     end,
  360: 
  361:     ?IPRINT("done"),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: 
  365: %%======================================================================
  366: %% Internal functions
  367: %%======================================================================
  368: 
  369: system_start_time() ->
  370:     note_store_handler ! {system_start_time, self()},
  371:     receive
  372: 	{system_start_time, SysStartTime} ->
  373: 	    SysStartTime
  374:     end.
  375: 
  376: note_store_handler_start() ->
  377:     Self = self(),
  378:     Fun = fun() -> note_store_handler(Self) end,
  379:     HandlerPid = spawn_link(Fun),
  380:     receive
  381: 	{started, HandlerPid, NSPid} ->
  382: 	    {ok, HandlerPid, NSPid}
  383:     after 5000 ->
  384: 	    exit(HandlerPid, kill),
  385: 	    {error, timeout}
  386:     end.
  387: 
  388: note_store_handler_stop(Pid) ->
  389:     Pid ! {stop, self()},
  390:     receive
  391: 	{stopped, Pid} ->
  392: 	    ok
  393:     after 5000 ->
  394: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
  395: 	    {error, timeout}
  396:     end.
  397: 
  398: note_store_handler(Parent) ->
  399:     erlang:register(note_store_handler, self()),
  400:     put(system_start_time, snmp_misc:now(cs)),
  401:     Prio = normal,
  402:     Mod  = ?MODULE, 
  403:     Opts = [{verbosity, trace}], 
  404:     {ok, Pid} = snmp_note_store:start_link(Prio, Mod, Opts),
  405:     Parent ! {started, self(), Pid},
  406:     note_store_handler_loop(Parent, Pid).
  407: 
  408: note_store_handler_loop(Parent, NSPid) ->
  409:     receive
  410: 	{stop, Parent} ->
  411: 	    snmp_note_store:stop(NSPid),
  412: 	    Parent ! {stopped, self()},
  413: 	    exit(normal);
  414: 	{system_start_time, Pid} ->
  415: 	    StartTime = get(system_start_time),
  416: 	    Pid ! {system_start_time, StartTime},
  417: 	    note_store_handler_loop(Parent, NSPid)
  418:     end.
  419:
